comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I received an eMail with about 240 recipient addresses. The display shows the first line of eMail recipient addresses and an indicator that there are more with the option of viewing the rest. Then I printed it!


Actual results:

I had 2 and one half pages of eMail addresses before the body of the message.


Expected results:

It would be nice if it would print what you see on the screen. (Print the first line and indicate that there are ??? more.) Maybe some kind of an option that you can turn on and off. Maybe something like the View/Headers. If something like this already exists then I could not find it.
